title: Collard Greens Slaw
summary: Collard Greens Slaw is a gluten free, fodmap friendly, and vegan recipe with 12 servings. This side dish has 93 calories, 3g of protein, and 5g of fat per serving. For 62 cents per serving, this recipe covers 17% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. 1 person were impressed by this recipe. It will be a hit at your The Fourth Of July event. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 45 minutes. Not a lot of people really liked this Southern dish. If you have mustard, celery seeds, wine vinegar, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 91%. This score is outstanding. Try Seafood Salad With Collard Greens Slaw, Perfect Southern Greens (Kale, Beet, Collard Greens, Mustard), and Braised Collard Greens, Mustard Greens, and Red Swiss Chard for similar recipes.

winePairing.pairingText: Southern works really well with Riesling, Sparkling Wine, and Zinfandel. In general, there are a few rules that will help you pair wine with southern food. Food-friendly riesling or sparkling white wine will work with many fried foods, while zinfandel is great with barbecued fare. The Maximin Grunhaus Abtsberg Riesling Kabinett with a 4.1 out of 5 star rating seems like a good match. It costs about 42 dollars per bottle.
